channel.title: On the Rails minor bug [Fixed]
channel.description:
Bug description: Train's physics fail Bug location: C2a2a; The train elevator.
[img]https://img411.imageshack.us/img411/6642/bmc2a2a0000.jpg[/img]
How to recreate bug: Simply save the game WHILE Freeman is currently "using" the train's speed controller. Load the game, and press up. One or both of these effects may occur:
- Freeman falls down, passing through the elevator's floor and into the floor below.
- The train gets stuck in midair, as shown in the screenshot.
Odd bug, but at least it's a bit funny to see the physics fail.
